name: The Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018
tagline: An Act to extend the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of Pakistan and the Peshawar High Court to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas
content:
Page 1 of 2 
  
 
 
 THE SUPREME COURT AND HIGH COURT (EXTENSION OF 
JURISDICTION TO FEDERALLY ADMINISTERED TRIBAL 
AREAS) ACT, 2018  
 
 
 
 
 
 
CONTENTS  
 
1. Short title, extent and commencement  
2. Extension of jurisdiction of Supreme Court  
3. Extension of jurisdiction of High Court  
 
   

 
Page 2 of 2 
 THE SUPREME COURT AND HIGH COURT (EXTENSION OF 
JURISDICTION TO FEDERALLY ADMINISTERED TRIBAL AREAS) 
ACT, 2018  
ACT NO. X OF 2018  
[17 April, 2018]  
An Act to extend the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of Pakistan a nd the Peshawar Hi gh Court 
to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas  
WHEREAS it is expedient to extend the j urisdiction of the Supreme Court of  Pakistan and 
the Peshawar High Court to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas  
It is hereby enacted as f ollows:⸻ 
1. Short title and commencement. ⸻ (1) This Act may be called the Supreme Court and 
High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018.  
(2) It shall come into force on such date or dates a nd in such Federally Administered 
Tribal Areas or part thereof, as the Federal Government may, by notification in the official Gazette, 
determine  from time to time.  
2. Extension of jurisdiction of Supreme Court .⸻ The Supreme Court of Pakistan 
shall have, in relation to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, the same jurisdiction as it has 
in relation to the province of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.  
(3) Extension of jurisdiction of High Court. ⸻ The Peshawar High Court shall have, 
in relation to the Federa lly Administered Tribal Areas, the same jurisdiction as it has in relation to 
the province of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
